subject: p12847817
History: -year-old woman with acute decompensation and heart failure. Shortness of breath.
Findings: Comparison is made to previous study from. There is unchanged cardiomegaly. There has been some improvement of aeration at the right lung base. There remain bilateral pleural effusions and a left retrocardiac opacity. No pneumothoraces are present.
